scripts.dev: if [ -d venv ]; then ./venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload; else python3 -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload; fi
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -r {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
